document_data.name: Elias Fischer
document_data.mainbody:
'''Elias Fischer''' was a commoner from the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''I am not leaving until Lily has a godsdamned coffin.''|Elias Fischer}}
document_data.Description: Elias was a [[human]] man with a light skin tone and black hair and mustache.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, [[Anita Fischer|Anita]] and Elias Fischer suffered a terrible loss. The couple's seven-year-old daughter [[Lily Fischer|Lily]] was murdered, leaving her parents grief-stricken. Anita and Elias planned on burying their daughter in the [[Lower City Graveyard]], but the undertaker carpenter, [[Ulkov Sully]], demanded a priority fee for a coffin due to a massive backlog of funerals caused by the skyrocketing numbers of murders in the Gate. Without paying the fee, something the Fischers could not do, it would've taken a month of wait time. Anita and her husband tried their best to get Lily buried via negotiations and demands from the [[Valmorba]] and her mortuary.
